analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/16/0x4302e25f5aded98f8923e1aed7e995621283d6be.sol:
	Contract TrustCenterToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0x4302e25f5aded98f8923e1aed7e995621283d6be.sol#214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/16/0x4302e25f5aded98f8923e1aed7e995621283d6be.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
